msbt.message: Turkey Day is starting soon!I'm very eager to taste the spread laid out by a first-rate chef. Oooh, this is so exciting, !

Is it already ?! That means it's just about time for the Turkey Day festivities to start in the plaza!Soon, I'll find out if the taste of the real thing lives up to the dreams I've been having of this day

Not much longer now until Turkey Day gets going!I'm very curious about what's going to be on offer at the plaza, but I'll be ducking out to cook a little too.If I'm not at the plaza for a taste test, come visit me and see what I'm cooking up, .
